name: Everything To Scale
description:
Made for  the GDL - July 2021 Jam, over 3 days.

The theme was: "Size does matter... Make a game where size really does matter!"

You have to make it to the tower by scaling objects.

There are some bugs... but sometimes everything works as intended. I didn't have time to fix anything so... Good luck!

I'm using Unreal Engine 5

The foliage is from the Stylized Forest project that was free some time ago.

Windows only
